main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a stationary unidentified flying object in Richmond, Missouri on June 23, 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed for around 30 minutes,The object was described as elliptical in shape and glowing,The sighting occurred around 6 PM,The object was silent with no visible means of propulsion,The observer estimated the object was moving at 500-800 mph before it accelerated suddenly.
witness description: a civilian, age 39, who was alone during the sighting
